text: Stepan Lucyszyn is an electrical engineer from Imperial College London, England. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to monolithic microwave integrated circuits and radio frequency microelectromechanical systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:English engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Stepan Lucyszyn
